GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
nfsd: Fix a memory leak in an error handling path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit aed8816305575b38dcc77feb6f1bc1d0ed32f5b8, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 6ee95d1c899186c0798cafd25998d436bcdb9618. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: nfsd: Fix a memory leak in an error handling path
OSV.details:
